author: Kevin Goddard
title: Stream Future's Self-Titled Album
text:
Home > Music > Stream Future's Self-Titled Album Stream Future's Self-Titled Album Posted by Kevin Goddard , Feb 16, 2017 at 11:15pm Out now in the U.S., stream Future's new self-titled project. 
Future shook up the game early this week when he announced that he had a new self-titled album dropping this Friday , along with a supporting tour to follow this Summer with special guests Migos , Kodak Black , Young Thug & Tory Lanez . Well luckily for us, this week flew by and Friday is already here… meaning Future’s self-titled album has arrived! 
Laced with 17 tracks in total, the follow up to last year’s Evol finds the Freebandz Gang leader tackling production all by himself over beats from DJ Esco, Zaytoven, TM88, & more. Having surfaced online yesterday in International markets only, fans can now officially stream FUTURE in its entirety here in the U.S. thanks to the good folks at Spotify. 
Be sure to show your support on iTunes if you’re fuckin’ with it... you know you will be! NO FEATURES < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 16, 2017 at 11:15pm 4 Views 
Out now, stream Fat Joe & Remy Ma's long awaited new album "Plata O Plomo." Out now in the U.S., stream Future's new self-titled project.
